title: Cognitive Apprenticeship-Based Redesign of Computational Fluid Dynamics Online Education Modules

context.prior_knowledge: Core fluid dynamics theory and advanced comprehension of numerical analysis
context.additional_context: Project-Based Learning Environment Emphasizing Practical Application Skills, Utilizing Personal Devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Explain three or more procedures for solving complex fluid dynamics problems using CFD (Computational Fluid Dynamics) simulation software (OpenFOAM/ANSYS Fluent)

Learners analyze three fluid dynamics case studies from real industrial settings through cognitive apprenticeship activities (2 modeling demonstrations, 3 scaffolding sessions, 1 reflective practice) within one week, propose at least two solutions per problem, and write reports meeting at least four of five evaluation criteria
Apply two or more CFD interpretation result verification protocols through peer feedback and instructor coaching, and write improvement reports
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
